channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for MI
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for MI

item.title: Report X-2024010696
item.description:
Report X-2024010696

Identified by scraper @ 2024-01-30T15:10:41+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-01-23
  • City: LIVONIA
  • State: MI
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: AN AIR PACKAGE WAS INSPECTED DUE TO THE SOUND OF AEROSOLS RATTLING DURING THE HANDLING PROCESS. RESPONDER OPENED THE PACKAGE TO FIND 18 FLAMMABLE AEROSOL CANS OF CROWN HEAVY DUTY INDUSTRIAL ENAMEL PAINT. THERE ARE NO DANGEROUS GOODS MARKS OR LABELS ON THE OUTER BOX TO INDICATE AEROSOLS WERE BEING SHIPPED. THIS PACKAGE HAS NOT BEEN ACCEPTED FOR AIR OR TRANSPORTED IN THE AIR BY UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO.

item.title: Report X-2024010513
item.description:
Report X-2024010513

Identified by scraper @ 2024-01-29T15:11:25+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-01-11
  • City: DETROIT
  • State: MI
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: AIR PACKAGE WAS GIVEN TO A RESPONDER TO INSPECT DUE TO THE AUDIBLE RATTLE SOUND OF AN AEROSOL CAN. UPON INSPECTION OF THE CONTENTS DISCOVERED ONE AEROSOL CAN OF SHERWIN-WILLIAMS FINISH REPAIR CLEAR TOPCOAT. THERE ARE NO DANGEROUS GOODS MARKS OR LABELS ON THE OUTER BOX.

item.title: Report X-2024010540
item.description:
Report X-2024010540

  • Incident Date: 2024-01-16
  • City: LIVONIA
  • State: MI
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: WITH PROPER PPE AND DECISION TREE, RESPONDER RESPONDED TO WET PACKAGE ON THE UNLOAD. UPON ARRIVAL FOUND A FLAMMABLE 3 DIAMOND LABEL PRINTING INK WITH A WET CORNER. RESPONDER TOOK BACK TO DMP AREA FOR PROCESSING.
